title: LHCb Upgrade Bridging Funds Jan-Sept 2014
abstractText: See the application "LHCb Upgrade: Beyond the Energy Frontier", Council Reference ST/L002930/1
impactText: Not applicable -- this grant is bridging funding only, not a full grant.
findingsText: This is bridging funding for the LHCb upgrade. It has enabled Warwick, together with other LHCb UK institutes, to remain involved in the LHCb upgrade at a low level, pending proper STFC funding. The work will be continued in the grant for the LHCb upgrade. Creative Economy,Education,Electronics
